title: Rush Hour podcast: Kisan Morcha calls for nationwide protests in support of wrestlers
content: In today’s edition, Union Home Minister Amit Shah appeal’s to Kukis to maintain peace for 15 days in Manipur, Rahul Gandhi accuses BJP government of doing everything in its power to stop the Bharat Jodo Yatra, and farmers’ body has called for a nationwide demonstration in support of protesting wrestlers. Scripted and hosted by Aena, produced and edited by Avinash Kumar.To get every episode directly in your inbox, sign up now⁠⁠. You can also listen to this podcast on Spotify and Google Podcasts.
